text: Dippoldiswalde is a town in the Free State of Saxony, Germany. It was the capital city of the Weißeritzkreis district. Today, Dippoldiswalde is a city in Sächsische Schweiz-Osterzgebirge Rural District. It is east of Freiberg, and south of Dresden. The town is on the Weisseritz railway, a narrow gauge railway powered by steam locomotives. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Sächsische Schweiz-Osterzgebirge Rural District
title: Dippoldiswalde
